Summary: Biochemical reaction from sertraline to sertraline carbamoyl-O-glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT2B4, UGT1A6, UGT1A3 or UGT2B7.

Biochemical reaction from sertraline to desmethylsertraline. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2B6, CYP2D6, CYP2C19, CYP2C9 or CYP3A4.
